data.title: Safety system for Home and living
data.descrition: All Solutions Tech Company Limited Consulting and installing SmartHome system Burglar alarm And closed circuit camera system Inside and outside the house

services.descrition: Smart home or smart home is the use of technology to control home appliances. Through the control box and sensor devices to detect different types of work Together, called the Home Automation system to facilitate the homeowners With the system to control the lights or adjust the brightness Operate the air conditioner Open and close the curtains according to the light conditions Order to open and close the gate It is also an anti-theft system. Which all work orders and notifications can be made through Applications on smartphones comfortably, Home Automation systems need to be used via a wireless network. Which users must have an Internet system to work anywhere By sending commands through the main control box to send information to the electrical appliances to work as desired.

property.pro: The control unit is enclosed in a sealed box to protect from dust, moisture, heat and insects
Electronic components are used exclusively from world-class factories only.
The motor has high power but consumes little power.
Drive system with grease lubrication eliminates maintenance problems
Spotlight connector with protective fuse, homeowners can connect the lights and use the remote control immediately.
Detection area 110 degrees, distance 4 meters
Adjust the light delay time 30 seconds -10 minutes.
Adjust the brightness of the room (dark - bright) where the light switch will start.
Can be used as Auto (motion detection) or On-Off (general switch)
Replace the original switch instantly. Use with bulbs up to 600 watts.
Suitable for homes or offices for controlling up to 3 independent switches.
Blue LED, beautiful, easy to use.
LED indicates the status of each power switch.
Weekly Timer size 1 switch button
Can open-close 12 programs
2 mode : Auto - Manual
Power (max) 600 watts
Ready Battery backup
Has high security Because it uses a specific frequency encoded
Can be used in conjunction with a switch And general power sockets in the market
There are no restrictions on the use of electricity.
Durable, long service life

services.descrition: Home burglar alarm is an alarm device when an intrusion from outsiders advances into our homes. That will detect the intrusion that will come and steal property. Or cause with bad intentions This will alert the home owner. In order to be able to stop the incident immediately It consists of three main components: control unit, various detectors and display devices. Each part will work together with the software. It serves as a system management function, so the home burglar alarm is like a watchman to keep an eye on the normal things that enter your home safely, and a digital door lock is a barrier and alerting the user.

property.pro: Graphic LCD keypad with or without proximity reader. Compatible with LightSYS and all ProSYS panels
Digital Microprocessor with Intelligent Digital Signal Processing
Gross Attack detection
Incorporates a door/window magnetic contact for shock and contact protection (separate zones)
Attempts to defeat the contact with large magnets cause a tamper alarm
Intelligent Digital Signal processing – differentiates between naturally caused vibrations and cuts out frequencies that cannot be caused by an illegal entry attempt
Ideal for windows, doors, walls and roofs
Encapsulated bi-morph piezo electric sensor
Model name: RK601SM Shocktec™ Plus with Contact

battery Lithium CR123A
The latest innovation that detects intrusion while sending images to a smartphone. (iphone/Android)
Order to take pictures from your mobile phone
Can take pictures at night or in the dark.
Two frequency bands distinguish between the transmission signal and the intrusion detection signal.
Two CR1234 x 2 batteries can shoot 2,000 times or about 3 years * (calculated from average usage 2 times / day).

services.descrition: Fire Alarm System Is a system for alerting when there is a fire Or the fire in the building Using different kinds of sensors or detectors As appropriate, such as a smoke detector (Smoke Detector), heat detector (Heat Detector), fire alarm equipment by the user (Manual Pull Station or Manual Call Point), etc., which this fire alarm system will Allowing people in the building to be recognized and corrected in a timely manner Prevent the fire from spreading beyond control.

property.pro: Detect heat, constant temperature 70 degrees Celsius
The material is white heat resistant plastic.
Consumes power when doing alarms 60 mA
There is a LED light indicating the working status.
Status when alarming is red LED light on.
Smoke detectors Without wiring and without connecting to any system control cabinet
Detect smoke using a beam (Photoelectric Technology) to detect
It is safe, not vulnerable to radioactivity as (Ionization Technology).
There is a chamber, a single point smoke capture chamber.
It can detect smoke both visible and invisible.
Able to detect smoke covering an area of up to 60 square meters in an area of up to 4 meters.
Looks precious, stylish - easy to use. To the general public
It is the smallest system that is easy to use and install.
The LCD screen displays English characters.
It can be divided into 2, 4 or 8 zones and can be attached to a maximum of 64, 128 or 256 detectors.
Terminal straddle device is an optional EOL module (EN 54-13 requirement).

services.descrition: This fingerprint scanning technology, known as biometrics (Biomatrics), combines biological technology with computer technology. To be used for identifying that person (Identification), which identifies today there are many methods that are very popular and used, including fingerprint (Fingerprint), palm print, face (Face), iris (Iris), DNA (DNA) or even the pattern. Voice cents when these data are compared against the feature data previously recorded in the database. Can distinguish that person from other people
